pages.text: Chemical Cards are used to send Chemicals between inventories, such as Mekanism Tanks.  These cards are only available if Mekanism is installed.$(br2)Overclocker values are documented on the following page.

MB/T values (max) for Overclockers:$(br2)$(li)0 Overclockers: 15,000mb/20t$(li)1 Overclocker:  60,000mb/15t$(li)2 Overclockers: 120,000mb/10t$(li)3 Overclockers: 180,000mb/5t$(li)4 Overclockers: 240,000mb/1t
